about_the_game:
The story background of the game is to realize the dream of traveling around the world. Earn money by delivering takeout and purchase tickets for global travel. In the process of realizing dreams, various difficulties and obstacles will be encountered. For example, during the process of delivering takeout, one may collide with pedestrians or be hit by a car, resulting in a wasted day. There is also competition among peers, where everyone is vying for the Number One and receiving generous rewards. The game provides various modes of transportation for delivering food, including even armored vehicles.

If you run a red light or exceed the speed limit during delivery, it will trigger police pursuit. If you successfully escape police pursuit, you can also receive certain rewards. In the game, you can also earn rewards by purchasing lottery tickets or doing something helpful.

name: Man For Takeaway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is an independently developed game that simulates deliver the take-out. There are various scenes in the game, such as day, night, and rain. You can also experience using different modes of transportation for food delivery and feel the competition among peers.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
